channel.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
channel.description: ZOMG! i herd there was new armors that boost your hp or something... JAGEX YOUVE DONE IT AGAIN! PLAYERS WILL BE EVEN MOAR OVERPOWERED! Discuss

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The bank can only be used before you enter the boss room though, to stock up on supplies. Once you jump down you can’t go back up, the only way to leave the boss room is to die or teleport.

Mod Chris L developed the boss so it seems like he’d know what to do, lol. Though I’ve heard that ranging is the way to go so far.

This video has some good info on what you should be doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

They give you a bank. That is nice

Seems like Mod Chris knew what he was doing. Melee all the way?

Here is a better video


^
In the video above the guy gets a pm saying that a group of about 51 level 138s killed it in 20-25 minutes.

Looks like a clan is like fuck solo we are doing this together.

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:22, topic:377934”][quote author=Spades link=topic=473816.msg3464734#msg3464734 date=1294800633]
My clan and I were talking about this, they should have set at either High Alch price, or at 1gp, and let us decide when it is too much.
[/quote]

I hope you realize the Grand Exchange is flooring the price of this armor. The street prices for these armors, party hats, etc are going to become the real prices when free trade is back. This armor is 500m now, it’s going to be in the billions in a few weeks. Players always price new items higher than Jagex has on the Grand Exchange.[/quote]

I know that, it just doesn’t help the rs economy in any way releasing an item that is worth 100M. I’ve watched a-couple video’s on people trying to kill this guy. I saw one with 20+ guys with pak yaks, and I kind of see why it is worth so much, but at the same time I don’t think this boss should have been released until trade update came back.

Read full topic

I hope you realize the Grand Exchange is flooring the price of this armor. The street prices for these armors, party hats, etc are going to become the real prices when free trade is back. This armor is 500m now, it’s going to be in the billions in a few weeks. Players always price new items higher than Jagex has on the Grand Exchange.

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Too be honest, this makes me all the more doubt have regular rs2 pking back. There still creating overpowered items, it seems like it would be a hard task to incorporate all this back into the old rs2.

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:17, topic:377934”]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-sq44XAwnPo

There’s Woox16’s first attempt at soloing Nex (with help from Mod Chris L) - It should be interesting to see if he ever achieves it.[/quote]

Honestly Woox will do that, hes a fucking insane kid… Explain to me how the fuck he uses SS and did corp with no food, crazy. Chris didn’t help me, he tanked here and there, but for him to get 1/3 of the hp gone himself, its pretty insane. I’ve got a friend that went in with 8 136+ Kids with divine, chaotics and shit, he used up 60 brews at half hp… So for woox to do what he did, especially for the first day is amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

To be honest, if they drop 500 million (lol, it’s a couple billion street price…) on an armor set, they kinda deserve their “overpowered” armor.

Plus, this is pretty much end-game armor, you won’t be seeing many people (if any at all) PKing in such, it’ll mostly be used to tank bosses and shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Zaros/Ancient Godwars Update Discussion Topic
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:8, topic:377934”][quote author=Spades link=topic=473816.msg3464722#msg3464722 date=1294800243]

RuneScape

Grand Exchange - Search Results

Looking to buy and sell in Gielinor? Check out the Grand Exchange marketplace to find the current market movers, prices, and most traded items.


RuneScape

Grand Exchange - Search Results

Looking to buy and sell in Gielinor? Check out the Grand Exchange marketplace to find the current market movers, prices, and most traded items.

What a fucking joke. They need to stop doing stupid shit like this. It’s all the new players “We want powerful st00fz0rz!” So Jagex does it, then makes it worth more then 3/4 of their players banks. That’s stupid. It’s freaking armor.
[/quote]
Not to mention they want it “PHR33”[/quote]

IMO: It’s the same people who come to RSPS and want a bunch of customs in the game. I prefer Old School RS.

Read full topic
